description: Variation of condition 2 (development built in accordance with approved drawings) to allow: Addition of a 3rd bedroom and bathroom Addition of studyUtility room moved Addition of new window to 3rd bedroom Window to study increased in width Reconfiguration of lower courtyards Changes to materials Minor change to the way the curved roof is constructed at 35 Victoria Road elevation and the removal of condition 4 (Site Investigation), condition 5 (Remediation and Verification) and condition 6 (Arboricultural Survey, Method Statement and Tree Protection Plan) of Full Planning Permission reference 19/3985 dated 20 January, 2020, for Erection of a single storey dwellinghouse with basement level, provision of cycle parking, creation of terrace and sunken courtyards with associated landscaping; relocation of access to 18 & 19 the mews with creation of a shared courtyard and communal bin storage.
site_name: Land rear of 35 Victoria Road and 18 &19 Victoria Mews, London, NW6
